com.att.research.xacml.std.dom

Class DOMUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.dom.DOMUtil

  • public class DOMUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    DOMUtil contains a number of utility functions for DOM document elements.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $
    Author:
    car

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • isInNamespace

        public static boolean isInNamespace(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                    java.lang.String namespace)
        Determines if the given Node belongs to the namespace with the given String name.
        Parameters:
        node - the Node to check
        namespace - the String namespace
        Returns:
        true if the Node namespace matches, else false

      • isNamespaceElement

        public static boolean isNamespaceElement(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                         java.lang.String namespace)
        Determines if the given Node is an Element and is in the given String namespace.
        Parameters:
        node - the Node to check
        namespace - the String namespace to check or null if no namespace check is required
        Returns:
        true if the given Node is an Element and the namespace is null or matches the Node namespace.
